headline.print_headline: Maryland Man Convicted of Exporting to Iran
headline.main: Maryland Man Convicted of Exporting to Iran

docs.snippet: A Maryland man has been convicted on charges of exporting American manufactured industrial products to Iran....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Maryland man has been convicted on charges of exporting American manufactured industrial products to Iran.

headline.print_headline: Alaska Senator Urges Kerry to Help Make Canada Mines Safe
headline.main: Alaska Senator Urges Kerry to Help Make Canada Mines Safe

docs.snippet: A U.S. senator from Alaska concerned about salmon fishing and tourism urged the State Department in a letter released on Monday to help ensure that Canadian metal mines are safe after a major spill of waste into waterways near the Alaska border....
docs.lead_paragraph: A U.S. senator from Alaska concerned about salmon fishing and tourism urged the State Department in a letter released on Monday to help ensure that Canadian metal mines are safe after a major spill of waste into waterways near the Alaska border.

headline.print_headline: Colorado Unveils 'Don't Be a Lab Rat' Ads to Curb Teen Pot Use
headline.main: Colorado Unveils 'Don't Be a Lab Rat' Ads to Curb Teen Pot Use

docs.snippet: Colorado health officials launched a $2 million "Don't Be a Lab Rat" advertising campaign on Monday, aimed at warning young people about the risks marijuana use has on their developing brains....
docs.lead_paragraph: Colorado health officials launched a $2 million "Don't Be a Lab Rat" advertising campaign on Monday, aimed at warning young people about the risks marijuana use has on their developing brains.

headline.print_headline: Firm Halting Sales of Dietary Supplement Anatabloc
headline.main: Firm Halting Sales of Dietary Supplement Anatabloc

docs.snippet: The dietary supplement maker at the center of a federal trial of former Virginia Gov. Bob McDonnell and his wife is halting sales of its product called Anatabloc....
docs.lead_paragraph: The dietary supplement maker at the center of a federal trial of former Virginia Gov. Bob McDonnell and his wife is halting sales of its product called Anatabloc.

headline.print_headline: No Charges for Now Against NASCAR's Stewart in Fatal Crash: Sheriff
headline.main: No Charges for Now Against NASCAR's Stewart in Fatal Crash: Sheriff

docs.snippet: There is currently no evidence that NASCAR champion driver Tony Stewart committed a crime when he struck and killed a fellow driver in a weekend race, the Sheriff of Ontario County, New York, said on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: There is currently no evidence that NASCAR champion driver Tony Stewart committed a crime when he struck and killed a fellow driver in a weekend race, the Sheriff of Ontario County, New York, said on Monday.

headline.main: The Latest Soho House, in Chicago, Comes With Its Own Boxing Ring

docs.snippet: The members-only social club pays tribute to the Windy City’s pugilism. And to its populism — this is the first location that is partially open to the public....
docs.abstract: The members-only social club pays tribute to the Windy City’s pugilism. And to its populism — this is the first location that is partially open to the public.

headline.print_headline: Jet Stowaway to Undergo Mental Health Exam
headline.main: Jet Stowaway to Undergo Mental Health Exam

docs.snippet: A woman who was ordered to stay away from Los Angeles International Airport after she flew from San Jose without a ticket will undergo a mental health exam....
docs.lead_paragraph: A woman who was ordered to stay away from Los Angeles International Airport after she flew from San Jose without a ticket will undergo a mental health exam.

headline.print_headline: Bob Weir Canceling Tour Dates for Rest of the Year
headline.main: Bob Weir Canceling Tour Dates for Rest of the Year

docs.snippet: Guitarist Bob Weir is canceling all of the tour dates he had planned through January....
docs.lead_paragraph: Guitarist Bob Weir is canceling all of the tour dates he had planned through January.

headline.print_headline: Court Resurrects Arizona Death-Row Inmate's Suit
headline.main: Court Resurrects Arizona Death-Row Inmate's Suit

docs.snippet: An appeals court has resurrected a lawsuit by an Arizona death-row inmate who alleged a prison officer violated his constitutional rights by reading a letter he wrote to his lawyer....
docs.lead_paragraph: An appeals court has resurrected a lawsuit by an Arizona death-row inmate who alleged a prison officer violated his constitutional rights by reading a letter he wrote to his lawyer.

headline.print_headline: Nebraska Court Ruling on Keystone XL Pipeline Not Expected Until 2015
headline.main: Nebraska Court Ruling on Keystone XL Pipeline Not Expected Until 2015

docs.snippet: The Nebraska Supreme Court will soon hear arguments in a dispute over the planned route for the Keystone XL pipeline but a court ruling on the controversial project is likely to be delayed until the new year, lawyers and activists say....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Nebraska Supreme Court will soon hear arguments in a dispute over the planned route for the Keystone XL pipeline but a court ruling on the controversial project is likely to be delayed until the new year, lawyers and activists say.
